title: Russell Cave National Monument: Things To Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do       Â      Native American Hoop Dancer Laura Bundy  Each year thousands of visitors discover the cultural and natural significance of Russell Cave. Some visitors spend their time exploring the great mysteries of the prehistoric Native Americans, while other visitors explore the 115 species of birds that live on Montague Mountain.Although Russell Cave is only 314 acres, its small size harbors big themes yet to mine
